full_text:
I wasn't at the Stanley. I live outside of Washington, DC. Maybe  
someday I start to travel to events like these. :)

I don't want anyone to misconstrue what I've said about the Luminator  
with my general opinion of Mr. Macy. I think he is a very genuine and  
sincere person who is deeply committed to life after death studies. I  
just think that in the case of the Luminator, it isn't doing what he  
thinks it is. And that's just my opinion, which I am willing to  
change if I see evidence to the contrary.

Ann
